

.. _sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series:

Time Series
===========

Time-based data visualization examples including datetime plots, forecasts,
seasonal decomposition, and financial charts.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Step plots.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/05_time_series/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_step_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_step.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Step Plots</div>
    </div>

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Moving averages and rolling window statistics.">

    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_05_time_series_plot_rolling_stats.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Rolling Statistics</div>
    </div>
